remarks: The operation of an image structure is defined to distribute over the mapping function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
statement:
imasaddf.f $e |- ( ph -> F : V -onto-> B ) $.
imasaddf.e $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( a e. V /\ b e. V ) /\ ( p e. V /\ q e. V ) ) -> ( ( ( F ` a ) = ( F ` p ) /\ ( F ` b ) = ( F ` q ) ) -> ( F ` ( a .x. b ) ) = ( F ` ( p .x. q ) ) ) ) $.
imasaddflem.a $e |- ( ph -> .xb = U_ p e. V U_ q e. V { <. <. ( F ` p ) , ( F ` q ) >. , ( F ` ( p .x. q ) ) >. } ) $.
imasaddvallem $p |- ( ( ph /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> ( ( F ` X ) .xb ( F ` Y ) ) = ( F ` ( X .x. Y ) ) ) $.
$d .x. p q $.
$d .xb a b p q $.
$d B p q $.
$d F a b p q $.
$d V a b p q $.
$d X p $.
